name: Sink
title: sink.cool
shortDescription: Sink is a link shortening service designed for simplicity, speed, and security, fully hosted on Cloudflare. It compresses URLs to their minimal length, allowing users to monitor link analytics and gather insightful statistics. Ideal for marketers and content creators, Sink supports personalized slugs and case sensitivity, and allows setting expiration dates for links. An example use case is a marketing campaign where tracking link engagement is crucial.
pros: 100% run on Cloudflare for enhanced security
Supports personalized slugs and case sensitivity
Allows setting expiration dates for links
cons: Potential privacy concerns with URL tracking
